title: Boston National Historical Park: Education
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education             Education       Explore. Engage. Learn.   Boston National Historical Park's educational programs and ranger-guided activities are designed to give students, teachers, parents, and learners of all ages the opportunity to discover, explore, and interact with Boston's historic sites.           Plan a Field Trip Boston National Historical Park offers a menu of educational opportunities including: self-guided visits, ranger-led historical tours and talks, and curriculum-based education programs presented by park rangers or in collaboration with a park partner.          National Park Service Historic Photograph Collection  Curriculum Materials Useful resources to guide educators and students in understanding Boston's involvement in the American Revolution and its role in supporting the U.S. Navy for 174 years.
